ygData.subject: Re: Words of Duress ??
ygData.msgSnippet: ... [cut] ... [cut] Words are the prime research ingredient for a magician like runes are for a wizard. I do not know which magician spell it is used for since
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Bob Thurston <bthursto@...>
[cut]
>Anyone know what the "Words of Duress" scroll is for ? I assume research
>but
>what is it part of... Also does anyone know it's value..??
[cut]
Words are the prime research ingredient for a magician like runes are for a
wizard. I do not know which magician spell it is used for since im not a
(poor) magician :). Words have the same value as a rune, about 1pp and some
gold if you sell it in a store, but i strongly suggest that you sell it to a
magician since it is really really hard to find both runes and words and us
spellcasters should support each other. I suggest taking max. 2pp for it.

Rotas Koth, Innoruuk.
